note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
title: Price level relative to the US vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The 'price level ratio of PPP conversion factors to market exchange rates' measures differences in price levels relative to the US. A value below 1 means that a given sum of US dollars purchases more goods and services than in the US.

display.name: Price levels relative to the US
